dmca.title: Individual demands removal of webpages with "copyrighted" devices
dmca.body:
1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the text and images that appears on http://www.irpowerlight.com, http://www.thetendonitissite.com http://carpaltunnelfree.com et.al.

2.	Text, images, testimonials

3.	[private]@irpowerlight.com

4.	The infringing webpage is http://www.infrahealing.com http://www.infra-releif.com These sites are owned and operated by [private]
[private] Cell: [private] [private]@aol.com and [private] [private] [private]@aol.com [private]@mac.com

5.	"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."

6.	"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."
7.	Signed: Richard Rever 3.21.06

--
Included in fax:

Conformed copy of US District Court Filing: Rick Rever vs. Neil Brodsky CASE number CV 06
